attributes.action: appoint an inquiry into the extent to which messages on the internet twitter network can be accessed and altered by malicious third parties, the inquiry to deliver its preliminary report by 28 February.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Wright MP had his twitter account hacked and a message altered on 16 February. Twitter is used extensively by MPs and members of the government. This vulnerability cannot be tolerated, least of all in the run up to the election during which twitter messages may have high political importance. The petition asks for a preliminary report by 28 February so that its findings are available before the start of the general election campaign.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
